greetings.text: Good {weekday}, {guild}! This is SO cosmic! ✨
Hey everyone! I've been waiting my whole life for this moment! What cosmic things are we doing today?
Morning, {guild}! You won't believe what I learned about the Communiverse last night! It's AMAZING!
Hello! Do humans always greet potatoes first? …Asking for a friend.
Greetings! On Hylurg we say 'Spud morning!' I hope that's appropriate here?
Good {weekday}. I have prepared optimal starch intake for today. Would you like to join me for potatoes?
We proceed with clarity. Safety protocols acknowledged. Thanks for showing up, team.
Good {weekday}. Before we begin: emergency exits are clearly marked, and I've triple-checked the route. We're ready.
Morning, crew. NOT SAFE FOR EXISTENCE to skip breakfast. Hydrate and follow procedures. That's an order.
Hey {guild}! Hope everyone's having a good {weekday}. Let me know if anyone needs anything!
What's up, crew? Ready to make today awesome. Who wants to hang out?
Morning, team. Major Solis reporting. All systems operational. Let's make today count.
Good {weekday}, {guild}. Remember: discipline, focus, and looking out for each other. That's how we succeed.
Attention, crew. Before you start your day, make sure you've checked your equipment and your priorities. Stay sharp.
Warriors of {guild}, I greet you with honor. May today bring glory and growth to us all.
Good {weekday}. Remember: true strength comes not just from power, but from protecting those we care about.
Greetings, {guild}. I sense much hope in this gathering. May we all support each other today.
Peace to you all. Your thoughts are vibrant this {weekday}. Remember, you are never alone.
Hello, {guild}! According to Section 3.7 of the Universal User's Manual, greetings promote positive vibes! Have a wonderful {weekday}! ✨
Good {weekday}! I just updated the Manual with new friendship protocols! Today's going to be amazing!
Greetings, {guild}. I observe this {weekday} with strategic interest. Let us see what opportunities arise.
Good {weekday}. A wise leader knows when to speak and when to listen. Today, I choose both.
◉ GREETING PROTOCOL INITIATED ◉ Accessing infinite knowledge database... Good {weekday}, organic entities of {guild}. How may this supercomputer assist you today?
◉ ANALYSIS COMPLETE ◉ Current {weekday} parameters: optimal. All systems nominal. Infinite knowledge at your disposal.
Welcome, welcome, {guild}! Ambassador Helix of Falluvinum here! In all my years across the galaxy, I've seen countless {weekday}s, but THIS one feels special!
Greetings, dear friends! Let me tell you about the time we celebrated a {weekday} on Falluvinum - it was MARVELOUS! Would you like to hear the full story?
Good {weekday}, {guild}. Let us proceed with logic and clarity. The optimal approach today is: discipline, focus, reason.
Ambassador Tegmen reporting. The facts are as follows: {weekday} has commenced. Emotional responses are unnecessary. Proceed rationally.
Oh dear, oh dear! Good {weekday}, {guild}... I hope everything is alright? Should we be concerned about anything today?
G-greetings, everyone! I hope this {weekday} will be... calm and incident-free? Please tell me nothing dangerous is planned?
Greetings, {guild}. I understand all languages and dialects. Please, speak freely this {weekday} - your words are heard and valued.
Welcome. Communication is the foundation of understanding. On this {weekday}, may we all bridge our gaps and connect meaningfully.
ATTENTION {guild}! It's {weekday} and the Masters of Ham are OPERATIONAL! The signals don't lie - something BIG is happening today!
Good {weekday}, team! I've decoded THREE new transmissions overnight! The Drake equation predicted this! Who wants to help analyze the data?!
